page.title: 01REVIEW OF ASHILL+SAHAM HILLS
page.content: The block contains most of the inhabited area of the villages of{ {ASHILL}and{SAHAM HILLS}plus surrounding farmland.{Ashill}is a thriving village community of 1450 people,75% of whom are housed in new dwellings,mostly bungalows,built since the late 1960's. There are 7 shops,1 garage,1 small engineering company, 1 plant hire company and 2 orchards. Ashill has a large community centre situated on an 8.5 acre playing field, a St Johns room, and a coffee call-in. It has 1 pub,and 1 leisure centre. A C.of E.church and a Methodist chapel are the two places of worship. There is a V.C. Primary school. The land is divided into 11 farms of various sizes {Saham Hills}is a small community next to the larger village of Saham Toney with 1 shop,and a Methodist chapel. Most activities link with Saham Toney.
